column2: an A.M. Eatery////I was visiting Austin from Los Angeles
column3: this place looked like a go to for the funky
column4: hipster type Austin locals. It didn't disappoint! I was offered liquor at 8 or 9am in the morning! This is not something I normally do and didn't that day either
column5: but it was an interesting concept
column6: if my day hadn't been so busy
column7: I might have ordered a spicy Bloody Mary with my breakfast.... the coffee was in point
column10: and creative. I truly enjoyed the experience all the way through. There was a bit of a wait
column11: which was a little unexpected because It was on a Wednesday. But
column12: it wasn't that long and it was definitely worth it. I highly recommend Snooze if you are in the area.
